subject: Swimming
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Bob Bowman, who made Michael Phelps the most successful Olympian in history, has returned to coaching, feeling recharged after months spent making pork tenderloins and yeast rolls.
snippet: Bob Bowman, who made Michael Phelps the most successful Olympian in history, has returned to coaching, feeling recharged after months spent making pork tenderloins and yeast rolls.
